dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4738 IH: Trucking Workforce Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Good of Virginia (for himself, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Perry, Mr. Donalds, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Jackson of Texas, Mr. Cloud, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Moore of Alabama, and Mr. LaMalfa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To repeal the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration’s rule titled Minimum Training Requirements for Entry-Level Commercial Motor Vehicle Operators.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trucking Workforce Improvement Act.

The final rule issued by the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration titled Minimum Training Requirements for Entry-Level Commercial Motor Vehicle Operators issued on December 8, 2016 (81 Fed. Reg. 88732) shall have no force or effect.
